file_content.text: Excellent. In position, and right on time. Good to know we still have well-informed friends.
Imperial commandos. Strange to see on remote world like this.
I wish we did. Perhaps they could have told us Imperial commandos were sneaking about.
Imperials have no friends. Only people they haven't betrayed yet.
Now, Jedi, our orders are to freeze you in carbonite, not kill you. So, kindly surrender now.
Your Empire usually goes to great lengths to kill Jedi.
Why do you want me alive?
This time, only alive will do. But you're not going to cooperate, are you?
I'm afraid I'll have to decline your generous offer.
I don't surrender, and certainly not to Imperial lackeys.
Yes, they said you might be stubborn.
Keep her still! I need a clear shot, or she'll just freeze and shatter!
Get him! And hold him still, or he won't survive the carbonite!
